request.body:
<processPartsRequest xmlns="http://www.orbotech.it.cad.extservices.org">
	<PARAMETERS>
		<PARAMETER NAME="CAD_TYPE">
			<VALUE>PDMLINK</VALUE>
		</PARAMETER>
		<PARAMETER NAME="CAD_VAULT">
			<!-- Notes: Here CAD Master = PDMLINK_ORBK_ISL and Cad Extension = PDMLINK_ORBK_ISL-->
			<VALUE>ORBK</VALUE>
		</PARAMETER>
		<PARAMETER NAME="CAD_IDENTIFIER">
			<VALUE>ISL</VALUE>
		</PARAMETER>
		<PARAMETER NAME="INITIATOR">
			<VALUE>earivazh</VALUE>
		</PARAMETER>
	</PARAMETERS>
	<PARTS>
		<PART>
			<PART_TYPE>Fuse</PART_TYPE>
			<DESCRIPTION>LENS HOLDER Number 1</DESCRIPTION>
			<UOM>EA</UOM>
			<IP_FLAG>DI RnD Restricted IP</IP_FLAG>
			<!-- TBD -->
			<PROJECT>ORBK FPD QTM ISL</PROJECT >
			<EXTERNAL_REFERENCE>VR:wt.epm.EPMDocument:175569639</EXTERNAL_REFERENCE>
		</PART>
	</PARTS>
</processPartsRequest>
